attributes.additional_details:
Youth culture has spoken this weekend with ongoing rioting across the country.
Show this generation what responsibility is, 2 years discipline in HM Armed forces, see what our loyal troops put on the line to give them the ability to have a free & democratic country in which to reside.
The unemployment issue, reserve forces losses and core interaction values will be addressed,
Place every person under 25 outside of employment or education in a position to learn skIlls in society
